Home Mush Mush Advice Q&A #16 (Read the first post!)
On march 11, 2017
spacekadt

Welcome to the 16th iteration of this thread! Ask your simpler game questions here, and see them answered (usually!)

We use a particular format, so please be sure to number your questions and answers accordingly. Also, please attempt to search the forum before you ask; the answer may have been posted in a previous thread. You can also refer to Mushpedia.

For those replying to questions, try to give accurate answers and to check your answer before replying if you're not sure.

Please note that this thread is not meant for questions leading to possible debates, to complex advice, or questions about the SDF.

Format Example:

Person with a questionQ1: If the ship moves, and we don't arrive at a planet, what happens to the planets we scanned?

(Person with an answer) A1: Those planets are lost forever, and you have to scan for new ones.

Before you post, consider this:

You probably shouldn't reveal too many details about your ship in your question. If your character isn't an important part of your question, leave your identity out. Whether you're Mush should also be left out, unless the question directly relates to Mush activity.

If people need more details in order to answer your question, they'll ask for them.

We've seen FAR too many newbies post things like, "I'm so and so and Mush, and this is what's going on on my ship." before asking a question...without realizing that experienced people not only read the forum, they might also read that very question, and might be on your ship. That usually ends badly for the person asking the question.
On march 11, 2017
spacekadt

Q1 (Carried from previous thread)
Do we know what happens if a mush, pirate radio, and talking with someone's else voice, transfert ?

If Janice mush pirate Kuan Ti, then transfert in Gioele. Will Janice human speak with Kuan Ti voice, or will Gioele mush keep talking with Kuan ti voice ?
On march 12, 2017
[8281990]

A1 - I doubt that we do know for sure. That set of circumstances seems rare, and I've only ever seen pirate radio used once (on me!) anyway.

However, I'd be inclined to think the pirate radio would continue with the new Janice human. Given that you get dropped into tutorial mode when you transfer into an inactive newbie who was using it (and have to clear all the announcements they missed), it's reasonable to assume that the game just swaps player positions and leaves everything else intact.
On march 12, 2017
Evalcat

On march 12, 2017

You can just check Mushpedia.

On march 28, 2017
Peanutz
Mais pourquoi est-il aussi mÃ©chant ?

They don't detect infection by doing the thing either.

Mycoalarms don't detect spores, they are triggered when the Mush click certain buttons (Infectious cuddle, Infect...). But there is no specific button for giving a spore to a human when you do the thing.
On march 29, 2017

On march 29, 2017
[3350190]

A8 - No they don't, on the other hand if you get the Teslatron Reservoir project, the ship will refill all the charges (outside or inside).

On april 10, 2017
iamp

A10. Nope, because the ship started before the season change, so it's a ship from last season.
On april 11, 2017
Darksteel

Q11 If my ship started before season change and ends after it, will the ship still get lodged in the rankings of the season it started in?
On april 11, 2017
spacekadt
DarksteelQ11 If my ship started before season change and ends after it, will the ship still get lodged in the rankings of the season it started in?

No, ships that start before a season change and don't fill before the switch are not counted in any rankings.

On april 20, 2017
Rhonda

Q15 Does diplomat work on expeditions even if they do not have a spacesuit on an oxygenless planet?
On april 20, 2017
[8744424]

A15 No, all crewmembers that aren't wearing spacesuit would be left behind and their skills won't have an influence on events outcomes (not fully sure about all the skills, but that 100% goes for diplomat), so all the events outcomes (damage/death/MIA/item loss chances, etc) would be distributed between only those who are present in expo (have spacesuits).

And that's why it's a good practice for launching pilots to check in rooms logs if enough people (and especially diplomat) have grabbed the spacesuits.
On april 20, 2017
Secondary

Only Traitor works when you are stuck in the Icarus.
On april 20, 2017
Veren

human skills for explo only work if crewmember is in the team (so yes, if you stay in the icarus you don't help, adn, in the same way, if you are lost on the planet you don't help either ( that's why it's alway better to give compass to the diplomat if you have one )

exceptions :
mush skill traitror work even if you stay in icarus => best way to sabotage an explo is to pick traitror and launch explo without suit => crew members are hit with bad events and you are safe, just make sure to be online when explo end to finish the work

pilot : since you are still in icarus when landing pilot work even without a spacesuit

sprinter : number of area is set when explo start, so sprint work even if you don't have spacesuit or if you are lost during explo
On april 21, 2017
Rhonda

Thanks for the replies! I actually thought the same thing with diplomat that it shouldn't work when they are in Icarus Bay. I had an expedition once where the diplomat stayed behind and yet we didn't encounter any fight events in predators, insects and intelligent life (I think predators was encountered twice). Maybe we were just lucky?
On april 21, 2017
[1820396]

You can see easily whether diplomat skill is working or not. Whenever it is working, then this will appear under any zone exploration log that might end with combat result otherwise:
Combat avoided because the expedition team has the skill: Diplomat

Q17:
if we have Bay Door XXL project finished
has there been any testing on what happens if non pilots launch Icarus with this project but without a pilot? does it still damage the hull and cause personal injuries as it is the case without Bay Door XXL?
and if those damages still happen, are they reduced thanks to this project?
On april 25, 2017
Secondary
DreamQ17:
if we have Bay Door XXL project finished
has there been any testing on what happens if non pilots launch Icarus with this project but without a pilot? does it still damage the hull and cause personal injuries as it is the case without Bay Door XXL?
and if those damages still happen, are they reduced thanks to this project?

That only works for patrollers and pasiphae. Anti-Grav Thrusters are what you want for the Icarus.
On april 25, 2017
[1820396]

Also, launching Icarus never damages Daedalus' hull or Icarus itself, as opposed to patrollers and Pasiphae. Only landing on planet surface is problematic with Icarus (and that causes damage only to the expedtion team, not Icarus itself), not taking off or getting back to Icarus bay.
